title: Is This a ‘Normal’ Covid Winter?
sub_head: Today’s surge would be worse if individuals and states hadn’t ignored Biden’s restrictions on booster shots.
body:
Winter 2021-22 may not quite qualify as our first “normal” Covid season, but we’re getting there.
The U.S. probably still has 25 million adults who’ve managed to avoid both the virus and the vaccine. Nobody knows, but perhaps 400,000 of these are over-65s most likely to take up a hospital bed and who are still without any natural or vaccinated immunity.
